title: Battery doesnt last on Pixel 3
content:
For the first month of use on the pixel 3, i would go for 8.5 hours on light use and battery would get to about 65%.

For the last 5 months i will go the same time period and the battery would be completely dead, even last night my battery was on 45% and i woke up in the morning to it being dead.

I have tried factory resets and all battery saving tips to no avail. Also the charger post is now extremely difficult to get it to recognize a charger in it.
